column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=After a long day at work and then the gym , I knew that a shower would not suffice .
#id=2
#text=I needed a bath - a long , refreshing , bubbly bath with the radio blasting my favorite songs .
#id=3
#text=I grabbed a towel , a luffa , and my radio and headed to the bathroom .
#id=4
#text=I sighed in relief as I eyed the bathtub .
#id=5
#text=I whistled a tune as I turned the hot water on and poured some of the bubble bath mix that I had .
#id=6
#text=The bubbles quickly covered the water as I happily took off my clothes and dove right in !
#id=7
#text=I grabbed my rubber ducky that was sitting on the edge of the tub and moved it into the water with me .
#id=8
#text=As I listened to the radio , I scrubbed and washed myself thoroughly , taking my time .
#id=9
#text=I turned the water off and continued bathing until my skin began to get all pruney .
#text=I hopped out of the tub and toweled off so that I was as clean and dry as a whistle .
#text=I turned my radio off and walked out of the bathroom with a big smile on my face .
